text:
A new Gravix, the dawn of a new day.

We added to Gravix:
- Limit and stop-orders
- Stop-loss and take-profit features

The update touched both Venom and Everscale. We optimized our contracts and made using Gravix even cheaper as well.

See for yourself: https://t.co/gnhgXFa98j https://t.co/rU4CfrJZfU
